# Introduction
<li>This document serves as a R tutorial to manage and merge the different White-throated Sparrow datasets generated by the Woltmann Lab.</li>
<li>The goal of this document it to create a repeatable script for the workflow of any project involving White-throated Sparrow data.</li>
<li>This document also seeks to describe common naming conventions for variables and establish protocols for missing data as well as data that has not yet been processed.</li><br>

# Workflow
<br>

## Working Directory
<li>The best way to establish a working directory in R is to use an R project.</li>
<li>In the project folder create a "scripts" and a "data" folder.</li>
